abstracts.cdata!:
The Government is committed to basic
            economic reform. Its goals are: i) maintaining a stable
            macro-economic environment; ii) making productive sectors
            efficient and internationally competitive; iii) privatizing
            land, housing and enterprises; and iv) protecting the
            affected segments of the population. The objectives of the
            Structural Adjustment Loan Project (SAL) are to support: a)
            the stabilization efforts of the Government; b)
            liberalization and progressive opening of the economy; c)
            enterprise reform, especially financial discipline and
            privatization; and d) an affordable and effective social
            safety net.
